thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com | 3 of 99
thread.title: Janie

author: Janie
title: Janie
text: I purchased quite a few things from this site before. There service is impeccable! Fast shipping and the items are exactly as described. I do get nervous with online websites with high end designer items but this site is now in my top 5 to shop for high end designer. Trust me it is worth it shop here, prices are good and very fast shipping! Thank you guys at SSense excellent job!
